item.description: This is at the Mad River Glen Ski Area.   Festival starts at noon (Noon-5:00pm) We hike up the mtn before the festival.  FYI:  The hike up is on a fairly steep gravel road (not a trail) all out in the open with some nice views.  No vehicles will be on the road.   Cabin at the top with views.  We can walk down the mountain or take the chair lift down. Festival is usually started once we arrive off the mountain. This is a small beer fest. Tickets must be ordered on line ahead of time (if you want to try the different beers). There is some food on the grounds and live music. http://siptemberfest....

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: Siptemberfest
